text: Hi everyone and welcome to the most objective test ever on Rage 2
If you're here to laugh...
...or to see if Rage 2 is a shitty game,
you're in the right place !
but first of all, what is Rage 2 ?
It's the synthesis of an alliance between ID Software, the talented developers behind DOOM
and Avalanche Studios, the "talented" developers behind the most boring open world
Just Cause 4
which is then developed by Bethesda, who are also responsible for the groundbreaking Fallout 76
if only groundbreaking could mean a nameless turd
so on one hand we have ID Software's skill
and on the other Avalanche Studio's incompetence
Let's what this is about, but first...
sweetie...
mmh ?...
how about we...
make a Pure VPN product placement ?!
of course !
Pure VPN is the IP of every country for less than 3€ !
Article 13, avoid all those bullshits laws... Pure VPN is the solution !
that's really a huge deal !
just like my
don't worry !
you can dowload Pure VPN on all of your devices to have the Netflix or Amazon Prime of any country wherever you go
and if you buy an account, you'll get 12 others with a free month for whoever you like
link in the description!
back to it
for starters, when you launch the game, we have a warning concerning epileptic crisis
Also, I'm allowing myself to tell you about the right thing to do when confronted with one
don't move the person, stay with her and cover her head
and DON'T put anything in her mouth
Then, we're shown an intro scene straight out of a film d'auteur
a mix between Jean-Luc Godard and Stanley Kubrick, here is a brief overview
I'm the bad guy
This is war
with top of the line dialogues as well
"Clegg Clayton, the most infamous businessman in the Wasteland
so megalomaniac he once tortured people just to hear them say yes"
this make no fucking sense ! Torturing to make them say yes
Spit it out ! Say yes
Never ! You'll have to kill me first
you piece of shit !
mmh... this neither yes nor no game has gone a bit too far
after that, we can choose as a character, a man...
and a man
then it FINALLY begins
slowly at least, since the game is full of tutorials who acts like pop-ups on a porn website without adblock
*warning* this game is really extreme
you'll see very hardcore sex scenes
doesn't she sounds like troom troom voice ?
you'll see very hardcore sex scenes+
a real pineapple crown !
are you able to withstand such violent content ?
no, it's actually a funny pink rubber!
with everything said, the gameplay at the beginning is so banal, slow, boring it will make you regret your purchase
It's that simple, it feels like an early 2000's game with today's graphics
well, the more you'll advance through the game, the more you'll get skills, which brings up to a 2007 game like Crysis
adding up to the fact there is no coop mode
which means you'll be bored, but all alone, unlike Bulletstorm, Borderlands
or its competitor by style, FarCry New Dawn
you'll also have weapons to unlock, shotguns, sniper rifles, RPG's, pistols
nothing we haven't seen before, except for one gun that is not free, but I'll come back to that later
because I need to talk about marketing, and it will be gross
the only thing, gameplay wise, I found fun and fresh
is throwing back grenades with my stock
the game has a colossal game time for an open world when compared to other games like Skyrim, The Witcher, Assassin's Creed
and their hundreds of hours of gameplay
Rage 2 won't bother you for long
less than 12 hours suffice! That's frankly nice to pay 60€ for a game that won't bother you for long
obviously, that's without the secondary content, like the arcs' exploration for example
which allow you to get new weapons and skills
you can encounter waves of enemies in arenas, destroy convoys, bring down bad shooting towers
races, spiced up by freezes while turning. Thanks Denuvo
you can also destroy mutant nests, trapshoot mutants,
turn down barrages by kicking everyone's ass
attack enemy camps and the best of them all for the end
harvest crappy crystals on a meteorite
some say Rage 2 is a "Fast FPS"
I think it's meant for its length
talking about speed, let's talk vehicles
you have to know that you can drive pretty much anything, which is nice
but the controls are real shit on a keyboard because you drive using WASD
Unlike the great Borderlands 2, out in 2012, in which you cloud drive with your mouse
motorbikes are also available, with worst driving, but at least you can't fall.
and you can only repair and improve YOUR vehicle, which is a bit sad
you might have understood that Rage 2's problem, apart from the lack of content
is its linearity. Yes there's a lot of customizations options
but at the end, it's the same
you'll be so bored out about doing the same shit over and over again you won't even finish the game with the unlockables
it's a shame because the game looks nice, the graphics are good
and I think with such a world, they could have made something with more taste to it
and due to that as well, the bestiary is a weak
To start, you'll encounter mutants with the latest nut huggers
with baby arms... How hard is it to masturbate with these ?
we also have mutants with underpants on
more than a few peasants on underwear
punks
some guys with armor
and a few big mutants we always have to kill using the same method
I don't have to say that if you counted on the gameplay's diversity to save the game, you've got it where I think you've got it.
and don't count on the story as well, or the charisma of the main character
after all, he looks like Gad Elmaleh
the guy who is prohibited to perform on Canada, who would have been roasted if he was American
because of the many jokes he "borrowed"
mmh, that's maybe why this character disgusts me.
Now let's talk about the feeling and atmosphere of the game
supposed to be amazing, as shown in the trailers
Here is 5 seconds of trailer so you can be impregnated by its vibes
and now the actual game
first of all, this is the worst nightclub in videogame history
it feels like the end of a party
3 assholes on the dancefloor surrounded by 3 other drunk dudes
what a party ! Rage 2 deserves its name
then we have vomiting NPCs that keeps their cigs in-between their lips. I'd very much like to know how they do that...
the only gore thing I found funny is this, me searching some chick's stomach
if they wanted to be clear on the actual experience, the trailer should have looked like that
that make the selling arguments far worse than the actual trailer that, I have to admit, is really well done
and this despite marketing scratching for every penny
let's start with a tweet talking about a ton of weapons
knowing the fact that they are only 6 or 7, it must secretly promoting Borderlands  3, which will give more than a billion weapons
let's talk about the deluxe version of Rage 2
sold for 90€ on consoles, and only 40 on PC (because we have taste)
this deluxe version, 50 bucks more expensive on console, allows you to cheat, LOL,
basically, it gives you access to a character with who you can cheat with
obviously, you cannot do achievements
and above all else, it gives you access to a very powerful weapon from DOOM,
who kicks major ass, the BFG 9000
only available with the deluxe version or above. It means you have to pay more for a weapon
ok it's just a weapon, nothing to brag about, but when I pay 60€ for a game with a 12 hour length
and a low amount of weapons, I'd like to get access to all the weapons
we can also talk about Denuvo, the thing that is supposed to prevent hackers to hack the game
Denuvo who does not allow you to play without internet on a bought copy
Denuvo who sometimes eats up to 40% of your hardware
Denuvo, the main man of anti-piracy
even it ruins the experience, was hacked in 24 hours
basically, those who hacked Rage 2 could play the game less than a day after the official release in better circumstances
this means Rage 2 is crap, for the players and the companies who use it
when having a good image and making good games is all that matters, like CD projekt
we won't talk about the actual game telling us Rage 2 is out when you are playing the game, that's frankly dumb
we won't talk about the sponsored articles on jeuxvideo.com
with a very bad video straight out of a bad news company on the internet
that compares Rage 2 to the best post-apocalyptic movies, like SUICIDE SQUAD !
buying an article on jeuxvideo.com was worth it then
that makes a great introduction for the press point
as expected, thanks to the sponsored articles, Rage 2 goes well on jeuxvideo.com
with a 17. Well they won't bite on the hand that feeds them
however, it's really suspicious the bad video has more views than their video test
that means people want to watch a horrible video and not the actual test
mmh, let me doubt. This is fishy, don't you think ?
Betesda, you better take a look at those stats
blink blink
ok, here are the pros cons and cons of jeuxvideo.com
A aventure with a complete French voice over
Amazing, it really is, this has never happened before
it was part of the Bethesda memo to include this ?
oh and by the way it's AN adventure. You're the first french website for videogames, MAKE AN EFFORT FFS.
oh and fuck it, when you see the difference between your rating, and the readers'
there is something wrong somewhere
well we'll directly read the readers' opinion then
we've got Malaxeur2Boobs who points the fact that paid DLCs are already planned, even with an empty game
that's what I call a valid argument for those who buy games
it really tips the balance on whether you want to buy the game or not
and the other best comment is in the same style
"ok the gameplay feels like DOOM, excellent in a fight,
but no multiplayer, no coop, no loot, no dungeons, so no point to playing it again
sell a game like that for 70€ bucks is fuckery
for 30€ it would maybe have gone unnoticed
we'll not forget a 20€ BFG, and paid DLCs for a game with pitiful content"
see ? people critic the content before the gameplay
ok I critic everything because I'm an asshole, but it's the content that feels wrong, not the gameplay
after all that, there are still people trying to raise the rating by giving it a 20
which is by the way there only argument
also we can see that the rating given by the readers, between 11 and 12, is pretty close to what the other websites gave Rage 2
16/20 ?! oh yeah they're part of Webedia...
On metacritic, the rating is 5.5 out of 10 by the users (which has been lowered since)
If you are still not convinced Rage 2 is average at best, I don't know what to tell you anymore
Ok, let's gate to the rating now
If you're looking for a good game in the same Vibe, follow Bethesda consul, buy Mad Max !
by the way it's made by Avalanche, when they still had talent
at least you'll still have value for money... OUT OF 20
if this test pleased you, don't hesitate to watch my other videos, a playlist is available
quit the chit chat, you know how it goes, share like and subscribe
This was the last big test of this season !
I'll be freer this summer, concerning the games I play, or the length of the videos
(that's IF I make videos) thereupon, kisses !
